data.message: I am not getting emails notifying me that people have replied to my comments. I also had a Facebook group that I'm administering set up to email me when there are new posts. I get NO emails about my own group. What's up!?!? I gotta fix this because I'm missing things and no way can I be a moderator if I'm not seeing what's going on!

replies.message: Hi Heather. Have you tried adjusting your email notifications? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2tUxMgN. If you're still experiencing this issue, please report it to our team here: http://bit.ly/2tUtkyu. -Jessica
